name: ec2-auto-monitor-lambda
description: AWS Lambda function to monitor EC2 instances and auto-stop when CPU exceeds limits

scripts.create: aws lambda create-function --function-name ec2-auto-monitor --runtime nodejs18.x --role arn:aws:iam::YOUR_ACCOUNT_ID:role/lambda-ec2-monitor-role --handler instance-auto-monitor.handler --zip-file fileb://instance-auto-monitor.zip --timeout 300 --memory-size 256

author: Cloud Cost Optimizer
